text: ^ Is this a thing people want?
I ask because it is a thing we can do, just not sure if we can legally sell it
It's a thing some people want! And yeah you can't legally perform a medical procedure.
I think <@U026PHQ3J> wants it for live case testing
Iâ€™ll pretend to be a doctor to implant it
I remember people doing rare earth magnets
And being able to detect electrical fields
Also to not be able to touch hard drives
when we did a project for Samsung for aging seniors, their research indicated that there were quite a few people who were into the idea of implants...
did they already have an implant?
lots of seniors have been getting pacemakers/defibrillators implanted since the 80s, i think it is something doctors talk to seniors about quite often
